attributes.highlight: … quick brown fox jumps over the lazy …

parameters.name: filter[query]
parameters.description: Query used for full text search on the Resources. If not specified, no results are returned.

parameters.name: filter[language]
parameters.description: Language used for full text search on the Resources. If not specified, only exact word matches will be returned.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Comma-separated field names to sort Resources by. Prefix with - for descending order. If not specified, results are sorted by relevance instead.
